page.title: 07A Visit to St. John's Church
page.content: Outside the Church we saw a shed it was called a bier shed and on the Church there was a gargoyle.We made our way into the Church, we saw the bells, theree six bels in the Church, they are about 400 years old. In the Church there is a Font, it is where you get baptised. On the top it is the shape of an Octogon. Then we moved over and there was a list of Rectors and the first one here was in 1301.In the Church there is a pulpit, that is where the Rector stands with his microphone to speak through it. The Chancel is where the choir sings. In the church there is an organ and at the back there is an alter. The roof of the church is called a hammer beam roof.
